colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RIGS 'DZIN DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS, ,MTSAN LDAN DANG PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS PA LTAR BRIS PA LA LHA SHOS ZHES SU GRAGS PA'I RTZIS MKHAS PA RNAMS DPYOD CAN GZUG POR GNAS PA RNAMS KYI GZIGS NA THUGS GYIS CIG ,YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
